patthana18.27:4.1: Saraṇaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:4.2: Saraṇaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:4.3: Saraṇaṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo ca naaraṇo noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:4.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.27:5.1: Saraṇaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:6.1: Araṇaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:7.1: Araṇaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.27:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
